The Story of the Elder Saraṇagamani
a monk and I, a spiritual practitioner;
When the boat was breaking up,
In the twenty-ninth eon from now,
I do not know of any bad destination,
the fruit of going for refuge.
I have done the Buddha’s bidding.”🔽Thus the elder Saraṇagamani recited these verses.
